headline.main: Santa Fe's Week of Native American Art Draws Thousands
headline.print_headline: Santa Fe's Week of Native American Art Draws Thousands

docs.snippet: A series of premiere Native American art and antiquities markets packed into a single week in Santa Fe are expected to attract tens of thousands of people to the New Mexico capital....
docs.lead_paragraph: A series of premiere Native American art and antiquities markets packed into a single week in Santa Fe are expected to attract tens of thousands of people to the New Mexico capital.

headline.main: Phillips 66 Lake Charles Fire Started by Heater Tube: Sources
headline.print_headline: Phillips 66 Lake Charles Fire Started by Heater Tube: Sources

docs.snippet: A fire on Monday at Phillips 66's 260,000 barrel per day (bpd) Westlake, Louisiana, refinery began when a heater tube failed on hydrogen unit being shut down at the refinery, said sources familiar with plant operations....
docs.lead_paragraph: A fire on Monday at Phillips 66's 260,000 barrel per day (bpd) Westlake, Louisiana, refinery began when a heater tube failed on hydrogen unit being shut down at the refinery, said sources familiar with plant operations.

headline.main: Simone Biles Blunder Tops Trying Day at Rio Olympics
headline.print_headline: Simone Biles Blunder Tops Trying Day at Rio Olympics

docs.snippet: Simone Biles is no longer Rio de Janeiro's juggernaut. A mistake on the balance beam prevented the American gymnastics star from a record-tying fourth gold at the Olympics, which were dogged Monday by rain, wind and fire....
docs.lead_paragraph: Simone Biles is no longer Rio de Janeiro's juggernaut. A mistake on the balance beam prevented the American gymnastics star from a record-tying fourth gold at the Olympics, which were dogged Monday by rain, wind and fire.

headline.main: Yes, Medicine Can Use Virtual Reality, Emphasis on Reality
headline.print_headline: Hard Cases; Nothing Virtual About Reality

docs.snippet: Surgeons can learn in a virtual surgical theater, wielding a virtual scalpel, among the many ways medical situations are simulated. But the moments of truth can’t be....
docs.abstract: Surgeons can learn in a virtual surgical theater, wielding a virtual scalpel, among the many ways medical situations are simulated. But the moments of truth can’t be.

headline.main: Biden: Trump Is 'Thoroughly Unqualified' for Presidency
headline.print_headline: Biden: Trump Is 'Thoroughly Unqualified' for Presidency

docs.snippet: Vice President Joe Biden assailed Donald Trump's ability to lead America at home and abroad on Monday, branding him as indifferent to the needs of Americans in his first campaign appearance with Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton....
docs.lead_paragraph: Vice President Joe Biden assailed Donald Trump's ability to lead America at home and abroad on Monday, branding him as indifferent to the needs of Americans in his first campaign appearance with Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton.

headline.main: Extreme Makeover: Graceland Updating Visitor Center
headline.print_headline: Extreme Makeover: Graceland Updating Visitor Center

docs.snippet: A new entertainment complex being built across the street from Graceland — Elvis Presley's former home-turned-museum — will include a large soundstage for live performances and movie screenings, and an exhibit honoring influential musi...
docs.lead_paragraph: A new entertainment complex being built across the street from Graceland — Elvis Presley's former home-turned-museum — will include a large soundstage for live performances and movie screenings, and an exhibit honoring influential music producer Sam Phillips, officials said Monday.

headline.main: Trump Is Already Making Our Country Less Safe-Biden
headline.print_headline: Trump Is Already Making Our Country Less Safe-Biden

docs.snippet: U.S. Vice President Joe Biden said on Monday that Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump's remark that President Barack Obama founded Islamic State had increased threats to the physical safety of U.S. troops in Iraq....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Vice President Joe Biden said on Monday that Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump's remark that President Barack Obama founded Islamic State had increased threats to the physical safety of U.S. troops in Iraq.
